meanings.definition: In a way that astonishes or amazes greatly.
meanings.sent1: The magician performed astoundingly well, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: She sang astoundingly beautifully, captivating everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat astoundingly danced on its hind legs, surprising everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The news of the treasure hunt spread astoundingly fast, like wildfire in the town.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was astoundingly colorful, lighting up the night sky.

meanings.definition: To a surprising or impressive degree.
meanings.sent1: The new technology astoundingly improved our daily lives.
meanings.sent2: He astoundingly completed the marathon in record time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel astoundingly outsmarted the clever fox in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness astoundingly touched the hearts of everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece was astoundingly detailed, capturing every nuance perfectly.
